data.eml:eml: A new species of riffle minnow, Alburnoides holciki, from the Hari River basin in Afghanistan and Iran (Actinopterygii: Cyprinidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Coad, Brian W., Bogutskaya, Nina G. (2012): A new species of riffle minnow, Alburnoides holciki, from the Hari River basin in Afghanistan and Iran (Actinopterygii: Cyprinidae). Zootaxa 3453: 43-55, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.214789
